content: Peace and Blessings to all, I just wanted to say hello as I'm the former Sgt Salaam who was suspended for 20 days several MONTHS AGO because I posted a wikipedia link. Well after numerous unsuccessful attempts to get reinstated, I just decided to come back under a new account that is nameless for now. I pray that all has been well with you and yours and I will be back on the soap box effective immediately.
